text: Stoneywood is a village northwest of central Aberdeen, Scotland, located near Aberdeen Airport. There are 2 elementary schools and 1 secondary school within the borders, managed by the Aberdeen School System."Map-Postal & Info" https://www.streetcheck.co.uk/postcode/ab219hx Accessed 10 January 2018. The only highway running through town is the A947, a south–north 2 lane road. ==References== Category:Villages in Aberdeen
title: Stoneywood, Aberdeen
